name: Pyramids
description:
The task will not be easy. There are many dangerous traps and monsters that will put your dexterity and ingenuity to

the test. The player will have the use of TNT and a gun but his best friend will be his shovel which allows

him to create and destruct bricks. These bricks will be used as stairs, bridges, protections …

The explorer will venture through 54 challenging 3D levels, divided in 6 worlds.

At the end of each level, the player will obtain a star rating which will be used to unlock levels:

- 1 star for finishing the level

- 2 stars for finishing the level and stealing all the loots

- 3 stars for finishing the level and stealing all the loots in a given time

The game will let the player use QR Code to unlock free new levels which are on the Pyramids web page.

Features

• Escape from 54 trapped levels!
• Only your skills and logic will save you from the dangerous Pyramid rooms.
